attributes.action: Say no to the use of UK tax to pay Royal Bank of Scotland bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Is it correct that the government is prepared to allow the use of our tax to fund bonuses for the staff of the Royal Bank of Scotland or HBOS?  As taxpayers we funded the bailout of the banks, not the payment of performance related bonuses to its staff.  These funds should be directed to more appropriate public services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
